meanings: (격렬한 싸움) fierce battle, ferocious battle, hard-fought battle, heavy fighting; (선거 등의) close contest

examples.korean: There was heavy fighting in the capital last night. 발음듣기 지난 밤 그 수도에서 격전이 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There was heavy fighting in the capital last night. 발음

examples.korean: a hard-fought battle/win/victory 발음듣기 격렬한 전투[격전]/격전 끝에 얻은 우승/승리 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Hard weeks of bloody fighting lay ahead. 발음듣기 피비린내 나는 격전의 힘든 몇 주가 앞에 놓여 있었다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Hard weeks of bloody fighting lay ahead. 발음

examples.korean: There was a ferocious battle between the government troops and the rebels. 발음듣기 정부군과 반군 사이에 격전이 벌어졌다 Neungyule
examples.english: There was a ferocious battle between the government troops and the rebels. 발음

examples.korean: A fierce battle was once fought here. 발음듣기 옛날 여기서 격전이 있었다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A fierce battle was once fought here. 발음
